summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1257, for the improvement of East Prospect Street, from Eleventh Avenue North to Fifteenth Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with asphalt, laid upon a proper concrete foundation, and by constructing brick gutters, concrete curbs with granite corners, together with all water mains and sewers, with their appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 13770, and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
